title: Super ONGC storm into semifinals
text:
Super ONGC storm into semifinals Super ONGC storm into semifinals October 11, 2015,Bengaluru, DHNS 
ONGC made a stunning comeback to defeat Vijaya Bank 72-58 in the semifinals of the 2nd Mulki Sunder Ram Shetty All-India Basketball tournament at the Sree Kanteerava Indoor Stadium here on Saturday. ONGC will take on Income Tax in the final on Sunday. Income Tax drubbed Kerala State Electricity Board (KSEB) 72-34 in the other last-four clash.Trailing 42-46 at the end of the third quarter, ONGC rode on Vishesh Bhriguvanshi’s (20 points) and Riyazuddin’s (20) shooting prowess and some aggressive defending by Yadwinder Singh to make a late surge in the game. Trideep Rai with 10 points also contributed for the winners.Results: Semifinals: Income Tax: 72 (Rikin Pethani 20 points, Akilan Pari 12) bt Kerala State Electricity Board (KSEB): 34 (Anoop D 11, Tony K Mathew 8); ONGC: 72 (Vishesh Bhriguvanshi 20, Riyazuddin 20, Trideep Rai 10) bt Vijaya Bank: 58 (Arvind Arumugam 15, Rajesh Uppar 8, Sanjay Raj 12). On Friday: league round: Pool A: ONGC: 71 (Riyazuddin 14, Trideep Rai 13, Vishesh Bhriguvanshi 13) bt Punjab: 57 (R Sharma 16, Rajveer Singh 10).
